# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    result = ""
    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 <= text_width
            current_line *= " $word"
        else
            result *= "$current_line\n"
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    result *= current_line
    return result
end

# Example
text = "Julia programming language is awesome"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text, text_width=15)
println(wrapped_text)
```

Output:
```
Julia programming
language is
awesome
```
